mapper.select: select orders.*,customer.customerName from orders,customer where orders.customerId=customer.customerId and orderId = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select count(*) from orders where productId = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select count(*) from orders where customerId = #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select distinct YEAR(orderdate) from orders where orderdate is not null order by orderdate
select distinct MONTH(orderdate) from orders where orderdate is not null order by orderdate
mapper.insert: insert into orders ( orderDate, customerId, productId, nameList, nameListSize, status, salesmanId, operatorId, signDate, signOperatorName, priceYsdj, priceBxys, priceBxyf, priceQtys, priceQtzc, priceQtysBz, priceQtzcBz, priceZjys, priceZjyf, priceYfhk, grossProfit, yfhkStatus, des, czdes, operatorDes, yshkStatus, priceYshk, orderSeq, type, singleProduct, ptTime) values ( #{orderDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nameList,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nameListSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{salesmanId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{signOperatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priceYsdj,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{priceBxys,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{priceBxyf,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{priceQtys,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{priceQtzc,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{priceQtysBz,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{priceQtzcBz,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{priceZjys,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{priceZjyf,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{priceYfhk,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{grossProfit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{yfhkStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{des,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{czdes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yshkStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{priceYshk,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orderSeq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{singleProduct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now())
mapper.update: update orders set orderDate = #{orderDate,jdbcType=DATE}, customerId = #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, productId = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, nameList = #{nameList,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nameListSize = #{nameListSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, salesmanId = #{salesmanId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operatorId = #{operatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, signDate = #{signDate,jdbcType=DATE}, signOperatorName = #{signOperatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, priceYsdj = #{priceYsdj,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, priceBxys = #{priceBxys,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, priceBxyf = #{priceBxyf,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, priceQtys = #{priceQtys,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, priceQtzc = #{priceQtzc,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, priceQtysBz = #{priceQtysBz,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, priceQtzcBz = #{priceQtzcBz,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, priceZjys = #{priceZjys,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, priceZjyf = #{priceZjyf,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, priceYfhk = #{priceYfhk,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, grossProfit = #{grossProfit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, yfhkStatus = #{yfhkStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, yshkStatus = #{yshkStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, priceYshk = #{priceYshk,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, des = #{des,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, czdes = #{czdes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operatorDes = #{operatorDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operatorRemark = #{operatorRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yshkRemark = #{yshkRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yfhkRemark = #{yfhkRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, singleProduct = #{singleProduct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ptTime=now() where orderId = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
